lastfm.title: Last.fm
lastfm.settingsHelp: Configure your Last.fm credentials. Saved settings override environment variables.
lastfm.apiKeyHelp: Your Last.fm API key (get one at last.fm/api/account/create)
lastfm.usernameHelp: Last.fm username to fetch scrobbles from

error.connection: Could not connect to Last.fm. Check your API key and username.
error.noConfig: Last.fm API key and username are required. Configure them below.

widget.title: Public Page
widget.description: View combined listening activity on the public page
